Test Steps: Open the homepage > Navigate to the product listing section > Verify all products are displayed
Expected Result: All products should be displayed with accurate details

Test Steps: Simulate API failure > Refresh the page > Observe the application's response
Expected Result: Application should display an appropriate error message and fallback UI
Actual Result: Error message and fallback UI are displayed as expected

Test Steps: Resize the browser window to various mobile screen sizes > Check layout and functionality
Expected Result: Layout and functionality should adjust properly to different screen sizes
Actual Result: Responsive layout and functionality work as intended

Test Steps: Register a new user > Log in > Log out > Access restricted pages without logging in
Expected Result: User should register, log in, and log out successfully; restricted pages should be inaccessible
Actual Result: User authentication and access control function correctly

Test Steps: Add a product to the cart > Verify the cart updates > Proceed to checkout > Confirm order
Expected Result: Cart should update with the added product and allow successful checkout
Actual Result: Cart updates and checkout process function as expected

Test Steps: Enter a valid product name in the search bar > Submit search > Review search results
Expected Result: Relevant products should display in search results

Test Steps: Log in > Navigate to profile > Update profile > Save changes
Expected Result: Profile information should update and save successfully
Actual Result: User profile updates are saved correctly
